await collection.getCollection("0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266")
await collection.buy("0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266", "ruby")
await collection.getCollection("0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266")
await collection.buy("0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266", "amethyst")
const collection = await (await ethers.getContractFactory("ItemCollection")).attach("0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3")
await collection.sell("0x70997970C51812dc3A010C7d01b50e0d17dc79C8", "ruby")
